name: A Salem Witch Trial - Murder Mystery
description: When a murdered family is discovered in 17th Century Salem, at the height of a witch hysteria, people start to suspect something supernatural to blame. An atmospheric murder mystery. Connect the evidence and see if you can deduce the secrets behind the mystery.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1000M 1.80GHz Memory: 200 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 / Nvidia GT 520 Storage: 200 MB available space
